page.title: 11CRAIGAVON AREA HOSPITAL
page.content: Craigavon Area Hospital is the major acute hospital for a population of{ {259,000.} The hospital contains nearly{500} beds and provides a full range of medical and surgical facilities. Consultant services are provided in;medicine,gynaecology,E.N.T.,general surgery,paediatrics,cardiology,obstetr ics,radiology and pathology. The hospital has;a special baby care unit,a cardiac unit,an intensive care unit,a phychiatric unit,a nosocomial unit and a recompression unit. The people of{Portadown}have provided a{MERCEDES CARDIAC AMBULANCE} by public subscription and voluntary help runs the{hospital radio.
